thread.title: CNN’s Nia-Malika Henderson: Diversity Push from ‘Smug Liberals’ in Hollywood Is Pretty Hypocritical
thread.title_full: CNN’s Nia-Malika Henderson: Diversity Push from ‘Smug Liberals’ in Hollywood Is Pretty Hypocritical | Mediaite

author: mediaite
title: CNN’s Nia-Malika Henderson: Diversity Push from ‘Smug Liberals’ in Hollywood Is Pretty Hypocritical
text:
Please enable Javascript to watch. CNN senior political reporter Nia-Malika Henderson said on CNN today that Hollywood lecturing the rest of the country about the importance of diversity at the Oscars is pretty hypocritical.
Hollywood, she said, is probably one of the “biggest purveyors” of “racist, ageist, sexist imagery across the globe.”
And Henderson wasn’t done there:
“In the history of the Academy Awards, 1 African-American woman has won Best Actress. The Oscars has been around for 90 years. So, you know, these sort of self-righteous smug liberals, I mean––it’s really hypocritical.”
Watch above, via CNN.
[ image via screengrab ]
